enhanced_by.reason: Consuming whitespace before consuming a word ensures that the word is correctly identified without leading whitespace.
Checking if the next character is a word character before consuming ensures that the method only consumes valid word sequences.
Both methods consume sequences of characters that form identifiers, making them useful for constructing assertions about the consumed content.
Consuming an element selector involves similar logic to consuming a word, making it useful for constructing assertions about the consumed content.
